alert.note: Alert for Allen; Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 9:06AM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Calcasieu River Near Kinder Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Mermentau River Near Mermentau Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro Bayou Anacoco Near Rosepine ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 915 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River near Kinder. * WHEN...From late Thursday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Flooding of wooded areas near the river will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 4.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Friday morning and continue rising to a crest of 17.0 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Calcasieu River Kinder 16.0 4.7 Wed 8 am CST 15.8 16.0 16.4 &&
